snippet: The N.C.A.A. has reportedly placed the Syracuse men’s basketball program under investigation because of failed drug tests by at least 10 former players.
abstract: NCAA has reportedly placed the Syracuse men’s basketball program under investigation because of failed drug tests by at least 10 former players.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. has reportedly placed the Syracuse men’s basketball program under investigation because of failed drug tests by at least 10 former players.

headline.seo: Report: N.C.A.A. Investigates Syracuse Over Failed Drug Tests
headline.main: Report: N.C.A.A. Investigates Syracuse Over Failed Drug Tests
headline.print_headline: Drug Inquiry Is Opened At Syracuse
